mapper.sql: id, drawbackId, drawbackMoney, drawbackStatus, returnedId, createTime, modifyTime, modifyMan
mapper.select: select count(1) from refoundorder where drawbackId like '%${drawbackId}%'

select
from refoundorder where drawbackId like '%${drawbackId}%' limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from refoundorder where drawbackStatus like '%${drawbackStatus}%'

from refoundorder where drawbackStatus like '%${drawbackStatus}%' limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from refoundorder where returnedId like '%${returnedId}%'

select
from refoundorder where returnedId like '%${returnedId}%' limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into refoundorder (id, drawbackId, drawbackMoney, drawbackStatus, returnedId, createTime, modifyTime, modifyMan) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawbackid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawbackmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{drawbackstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnedid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyman,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update refoundorder
drawbackId = #{drawbackid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drawbackMoney = #{drawbackmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
drawbackStatus = #{drawbackstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
returnedId = #{returnedid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyMan = #{modifyman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
